attributes.comment:
As a immigrant myself, I strongly against raising the fees for all kinds of
immigration. First of all, raising the fees will discourage the immigration and will
keep us staying in the states. As a net result, the intelligence of these immigrants
will moved to the competents of USA. Secondly, substantial increase the charges
one after another time is out of the limit of the applicant since most of us are not
rich at all. Finally, we paied tax every year which should be the major financial
source of maintaining the BSCIS, why ask so much more from the applicants?
Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
